name: NIGHT FEAR
description:
NIGHT FEAR is a fast-paced roguelike where you play as a brave knight, the last of a line of liberators. Use the best weapons and skills to defeat enemy units and not die in a dark dungeon. You must give it your all, collect the best weapons, complete all levels of the dungeon and stay alive!

Enemies have settled in the lands of the dark dungeon, not allowing passage to anyone or anything living. Even the best warrior will face defeat or endless nights searching for a way out.

You are a nameless knight, the last of a line of liberators. Resurrected to help and free the dungeon from enemies!

The game is a 2D roguelike platformer with many rooms and enemies!

Game Features:
- Pixel graphics
- Lots of levels
- Various enemies
- Nice soundtrack
